questions.question: Generate Workspace automatically duplicates the reader schema on the writer schema, taking format limitations into account.
When using the Generate Workspace dialog, which of the following is not mandatory?
Which of the following is not an advantage of using a Database Connection?
options: The connection file is associated with the user, not the workspace.
The reader will perform better when using a database connection.
You can share a workspace without having to share database permissions.
You can upload a workspace to FME Server and optionally include the database permissions.

questions.question: The GeometryFilter created by Generate Workspace is a kind of:
How big is the resulting geodatabase (rounded to the nearest kilobyte)?
